<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Tick Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=827)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

This swarm of thousands of fist-sized ticks forms a moving carpet of bloated insects—a nauseating and intimidating sight.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Tick Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=827)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +6

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 130

**Immunities**
precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5, piercing 10, slashing 10

**Weaknesses**
area damage 10, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 10

**Cling** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature leaves the swarm's space; **Effect** The swarm takes 1d6 damage as ticks cling to the creature and continue biting, dealing 3d6 [persistent piercing damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). Immersion in water reduces the DC of the flat check to end this persistent damage to 5, and any area damage dealt to the creature destroys these clinging ticks.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Swarming Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 3d6 piercing damage (DC 28 basic Reflex save) plus Cling and exposure to tick fever.

**Tick Fever**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** DC 27 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 day; **Stage 1** [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 day); **Stage 2** enfeebled 2 (1 day).

</column>

name: Tick Swarm
